remarks: The value of the operator resulting from the outer product ` | A >. ` ` <. B | ` of two vectors.  Equation 8.1 of [Prugovecki] p. 376. (Contributed by NM, 15-May-2006.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 16-Nov-2013.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement: kbval $p |- ( ( A e. ~H /\ B e. ~H /\ C e. ~H ) -> ( ( A ketbra B ) ` C ) = ( ( C .ih B ) .h A ) ) $.
